newsitem.title: HUNGARY: Hungary's forint ends steady vs basket.
newsitem.headline: Hungary's forint ends steady vs basket.

text.p: The Hungarian forint closed unchanged against the central bank's currency basket after trading for most of the afternoon around the National Bank of Hungary's resistance level, traders said.
However, it gave up a few fillers against the dollar from midday after the U.S. currency regained some losses against the German mark, but was stronger than at the opening, they added.
The forint closed at 180.70/75 to the dollar, compared with 180.45/50 at midday and 180.80/90 at the opening.
(NBH basket: 30 pct dollar + 70 pct mark; NBH floating intervention range: 4.5 pct wide)
